word_mean: 多足虫：多足纲之任一种

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生物科学词汇（简体） ... myotome 肌节 myriapod 多足动物; 多足类 Myriapoda 多足纲.
...[注]前缀myria-也有不定量的数量关系的意思。例如表示“多，无数”的含义。Myriorama（万景画），myriapod（多足类动物），Myriarch（万人之将）（5）表示定量数量“百万，兆，百万分之一，微”：.
myriapod英['miri p d]美['miri p d] 添加到我的生词本复制词条  n. 多足类a. 多足类的英英解释名词解释: general term for any terrestrial arthropod.

list.abs: myotonometer 肌张力计myriapods 多足类myrmecology 蚁学

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from modern Latin Myriapoda, from Greek murias (see myriad) + pous, pod- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. general term for any terrestrial arthropod having an elongated body composed of many similar segments: e.g. centipedes and millipedes
